con:part.con:content: <definitions name="ESB_RECEIVER" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/orawsv/ESBMGR/ESB_RECEIVER" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/orawsv/ESBMGR/ESB_RECEIVER" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/orawsv/ESBMGR/ESB_RECEIVER" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:element name="ESB_RECEIVERInput"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="P_RESPONSE-XMLTYPE-OUT"> <xsd:complexType/> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="P_MESSAGE-XMLTYPE-IN"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ESB_RECEIVEROutput"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="P_RESPONSE"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="ESB_RECEIVERInputMessage"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:ESB_RECEIVERInput"/> </message> <message name="ESB_RECEIVEROutputMessage"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:ESB_RECEIVEROutput"/> </message> <portType name="ESB_RECEIVERPortType"> <operation name="ESB_RECEIVER"> <input message="tns:ESB_RECEIVERInputMessage"/> <output message="tns:ESB_RECEIVEROutputMessage"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="ESB_RECEIVERBinding" type="tns:ESB_RECEIVERPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="ESB_RECEIVER"> <soap:operation soapAction="ESB_RECEIVER"/> <input> <soap:body parts="parameters" use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body parts="parameters" use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="ESB_RECEIVERService"> <documentation>Oracle Web Service</documentation> <port name="ESB_RECEIVERPort" binding="tns:ESB_RECEIVERBinding"> <soap:address location="http://ams-ivptest:8091/orawsv/ESBMGR/ESB_RECEIVER"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
